_header: This St. Ninian I of say
Subjects: Ninian, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: Life of St. Ninian in the Scottish Legendary

CULGg26.First Lines:
[T]his sanct niniane I of sayþat quyk and ded blissit wes
                    ay…
CULGg26.Last Lines:
…þane þe todire leg had bene& þis meralle
                    wes mad kyd…
